statements: UPDATE predictive_analytics_table SET prediction='High' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE predictive_analytics_table SET prediction='Low' WHERE customer_id=2;
UPDATE predictive_analytics_table SET prediction='Medium' WHERE customer_id=3;
UPDATE Customer SET age = age + 1 WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE PurchaseHistory SET amount = amount * 1.1 WHERE purchase_id = 100;
UPDATE Customer SET name = 'New Customer Name' WHERE customer_id = 3;
UPDATE customer_data SET age = 30 WHERE customer_id = 1001;
UPDATE purchase_history SET total_amount = 150.00 WHERE purchase_id = 2001;
UPDATE product_catalog SET price = 49.99 WHERE product_id = 3001;

UPDATE transactions SET amount = 100.00 WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE products SET category = 'New Category' WHERE product_id = 1;
